Title: Requires the department of environmental conservation to revoke any permit issued by the department if the permittee is in violation of any state or federal law
Summary: Requires the department of environmental conservation to revoke any permit issued by the department if the permittee is in violation of any state or federal law.
ActClause: AN ACT to require the department of environmental conservation to revoke any permit issued by the department if the permittee is in violation of any state or federal law
